story.text: JAKARTA Jan 2 The Indonesian unit of Canadian nickel producer Inco Ltd N.TO said it had cut weekly production by around 130 tonnes (300,000 pounds) as dry weather had caused low reservoir levels at its hydro-electric power plant. (Reporting by Fitri Wulandari, editing by Jerry Norton; Reuters Messaging:fitri.wulandari.reuters.com@reuters.net;Tel +6221 3846364)
story.title: indonesia ' s inco cuts weekly nickel output by 130 t
